title: Shiitake Mushroom
description: A popular edible mushroom with a rich, savory flavor.

title: Portobello Mushroom
description: Large, meaty mushrooms perfect for grilling.

title: Oyster Mushroom
description: Delicate mushrooms with a subtle seafood flavor.

title: Chanterelle
description: Golden-colored wild mushrooms with a fruity aroma.

title: Porcini Mushroom
description: Premium mushrooms with a nutty, earthy flavor.

title: Enoki Mushroom
description: Thin, white mushrooms with a mild flavor and crunchy texture.

title: Maitake Mushroom
description: Also known as 'Hen of the Woods', with a rich umami flavor.

title: Crimini Mushroom
description: Baby bella mushrooms with a deeper flavor than white mushrooms.
